text: Kevin Spacey Will Host the 2017 Tony Awards The Oscar and Tony winner will emcee the June 11 event. Oscar and Tony Award winner and House of Cards star Kevin Spacey is set to host the 71st annual Tony Awards, which will take place Sunday, June 11 at Radio City Music Hall. “ I was their second choice for Usual Suspects, fourth choice for American Beauty and 15th choice to host this year's Tony Awards. I think my career is definitely going in the right direction, ” said Spacey in a statement. “ Maybe I can get shortlisted to host the Oscars if everyone else turns it down. ” Nominations for this year's Tonys will be announced May 2 by two performers who received nods last year : Hamilton's Christopher Jackson and She Loves Me's Jane K
